post.author: 임기순
post.content:
We are currently looking for a Programmer / Analyst, Level 3 - Java resource for a 1 month contract position with our client located in Toronto, Ontario . Please have a look at the description, and call me at 416-646-2811 ext 232 or e-mail me at cgrant@antandbee.com, if you are interested.The client is looking for someone who is available June 16th, 2010. Please feel free to forward this job description to any of your colleagues that might be interested.
General Programmer / Analyst Skills: 1) Must have 10+ years of industry experience in a senior Programmer / Analyst role; 2) Proven experience in these areas: · structured methodologies for the development, design, implementation and maintenance of applications · use of object and/or third generation language development tools · one or more programming languages · relational and hierarchical database technologies · use of information retrieval packages using query languages · one or more communications protocols · excellent analytical, problem-solving and decision-making skills; verbal and written communication skills; interpersonal and negotiation skills · a team player with a track record for meeting deadlines 3) Knowledge and experience with programming Internet-ready applications 4) Knowledge and experience in rapid application development (RAD) methodologies
Additional, Required Skills:
1) Expert level with JAVA scripting 2) Expert level with Adobe development tools
Thank you very much for your consideration and have a wonderful day.
Regards,
Cecile Grant Ant and Bee Corporation 416-646-2811ext 232 cgrant@antandbee.com
post.title: Contract Position 1 month
